SEARCH
Package gazoduc

Class Gazoduc

java.lang.Object
gazoduc.Gazoduc
public class Gazoduc extends Object
Gazoduc : a helper object for nextflow. Get the singleton instance before including any sub-nextflow file the following way: 
 def gazoduc = gazoduc.Gazoduc.getInstance(params);

      public Gazoduc.Parameter make(String key, Object value)
      creates a new entry for a Parameter but don't insert it in the params object.
      Parameters:
      key - name for this parameter
      value - value for this parameter
      Returns:
      the new parameter

    • putDefaults

      public Gazoduc putDefaults()
      put the default parameters in the context. Default parameters are: --help, --prefix and --publishDir
      Returns:
      this

    • putReference

      public Gazoduc putReference()
      put the default parameter --reference in the context

    • putCondaEnv

      public Gazoduc putCondaEnv()
      Specific to my lab. Conda env are defined using the env variable CONDA_ENVS_PATH
      Returns:
      this

    • usage

      public Gazoduc.UsageBuilder usage()
      Returns:
      create a new Gazoduc.UsageBuilder

    • validate

      public void validate()
      call validate for each Gazoduc.Parameter. Checks Genomes and Genome can be loaded.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - is this instance cannot be validated.

    • getInstance

      public static Gazoduc getInstance(Map<String,Object> params)
      create the current singleton instance of Gazoduc or return the current if it was already defined. This function MUST be called before including any other sub-nextflow file. 
      def gazoduc = gazoduc.Gazoduc.getInstance(params);
      Returns:
      current singleton instance of Gazoduc

    • getInstance

      public static Gazoduc getInstance()
      Returns:
      current singleton instance previously generated with getInstance(params)
